title: Interaction Between Sleep and Technology Learning: Relearning Design for Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course Where Pre-Service Teachers Relearn Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills in a Smartphone-Based VR Environment and Analyze the Correlation Between Sleep Cycles and Learning Outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of sleep patterns on mathematical problem relearning efficiency using at least three indicators within four weeks.
Learners can accurately measure post-sleep performance changes in solving spatiotemporal reasoning problems by over 20% using VR simulations.
Based on research findings, learners can design at least one sleep-learning integrated educational strategy for pre-service teachers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
